ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanters and the Charisma vs Int Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: amy, i m a human enchanter with 200int and 215 cha (buffed of course) but that s after some planer gear.  Human enchanters seem kinda annoying now, but my
ygData.messageBody:
amy, i'm a human enchanter with 200int and 215 cha (buffed of course) but
that's after some planer gear. Human enchanters seem kinda annoying now,
but my stats are up there now. :o)

My question to you high level chanters are you goin for the same as me now,
since i too have noticed no differance in Cha 255 and cha 180 either. I've
opted for Ac/hp/mana after that.

I don't see how with buffs it's not impossible, but prolly gonna be level 44
till you get it unless you dumped your points into Cha and went for staight
int gear and then again it's still kinda iffy cause of the race, i know i
wasn't 200 each till after some planer gear.

hope that answers something lol


Chantisis Tashania
Lvl 54 enchanter <dol amroth>
Rodcet Nife
